actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to print as a Senate document a collection of statements made in tribute to the late First Lady of the United States, Patricia Ryan Nixon.

summary.text: Requires the printing as a Senate document of a collection of statements made in tribute to the late First Lady of the United States, Patricia Ryan Nixon, together with appropriate illustrations and other materials relating to her death.

titles.title: A resolution to print as a Senate document a collection of statements made in tribute to the late First Lady of the United States, Patricia Ryan Nixon.
